The soft glow of the stained glass windows cast a kaleidoscope of colors across the pews, and the sweet scent of incense wafted through the air, transporting me to a bygone era. I took a seat in the back pew, my eyes drifting to the intricate carvings on the wooden pews, their stories of saints and angels whispering tales of a world beyond my own. The soft murmur of the congregation's prayers and the gentle rustle of pages turning in the hymnals created a soothing background hum, a lullaby of faith and community.
